subdisciplines.name: Transgender History
subdisciplines.description: The study of the history and evolution of transgender identities and experiences.

subdisciplines.name: Transgender Health
subdisciplines.description: The study of medical and mental health care for transgender individuals, including issues related to hormones, surgery, and access to care.

subdisciplines.name: Transgender Law and Policy
subdisciplines.description: The study of laws and policies related to transgender rights and legal protections, including issues related to discrimination, identity documents, and restroom access.
